SEARCH
Package songsorter.music

Class Song

java.lang.Object
songsorter.music.Song
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpotifySong
public class Song extends Object
Class to represent any generic song, file based or spotify based. Primarily used for file based songs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Default constructor for subclasses

    Constrctor that creates the Song object without calculating emotions

    Constrctor that creates the Song object and calculates emotions

  • Constructor Details

    • Song

      public Song()
      Default constructor for subclasses

    • Song

      public Song(String fp) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException
      Constrctor that creates the Song object without calculating emotions
      Parameters:
      fp - Filepath of the mp3 to be analyzed
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - If the file is not an mp3

    • Song

      public Song(String fp, PythonEnvHandler penv) throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, PythonError, IOException, InterruptedException
      Constrctor that creates the Song object and calculates emotions
      Parameters:
      fp - Filepath of the mp3 to be analyzed
      penv - the PythonEnvHandler that will be used for emotion computation
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - If the file is not an mp3
      PythonError - if Python service fails
      InterruptedException
      IOException

      Changes the song's title

    • getEmotions

      public EmotionPoint[] getEmotions()
      Gets the array of EmotionPoints which represent annotatiosn every 0.5 seconds of the mp3
      Returns:
      array of EmotionPoints

    • setEmotions

      public void setEmotions(PythonEnvHandler penv) throws PythonError, IOException, InterruptedException
      (Re)compute the emotions of the Song object
      Parameters:
      penv - the PythonEnvHandler that will be used for emotion computation
      Throws:
      PythonError - if underlying Python service fails
      IOException - If reading/writing to CLI fails
      InterruptedException - If underlying Python script fails mid-execution

    • getArousalAsList

      public double[] getArousalAsList()
      Get only the arousals of the song as an array
      Returns:
      An array of double's representing only the getArousal()s of each EmotionPoint

    • getValenceAsList

      public double[] getValenceAsList()
      Get only the valences of the song as an array
      Returns:
      An array of double's representing only the getValences()s of each EmotionPoint

    • getAverageArousal

      public double getAverageArousal()
      Works by compptuing the average of getArousalAsList()
      Returns:
      the average arousal of the song

    • getAverageValence

      public double getAverageValence()
      Works by compptuing the average of getValenceAsList()
      Returns:
      the average valence of the song

    • asEmotion

      public String asEmotion()
      Method to get the avarage emotion coordinates from a Song as an interpretable emotion as per Figure 1 from Yik, M., Russell, J.A., invalid input: '&' Steiger, J.H. (2011). A 12-Point Circumplex Structure of Core Affect. Emotion, 11 4, 705-31.
      Returns:
      String emotion
